|rad1chip3 = Quantenna;QT1518B; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = none, integral (PIFA) |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== '''NETGEAR''''s manual states the default SSID is '''WNHD3400'''.. :.. however, there are no hits for this SSID in '''WiGLE''' as of 03/2013. AP mode IP of 192.168.1.240, Bridge mode IP of 192.168.1.241 :OEM: [[SerComm]] (YTL00D-1.6) {{WiFiCert|WFA9935|09/23/2010}} :see also [http://certifications.prod.wi-fi.org/pdf/certificate/public/download?cid=WFA12963 WFA12963 (WNHD3004v2)] Sold as a pair in ''3DHD Wireless Home Theater Networking Kit'' (WNHDB3004) ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31296-netgear-wnhdb3004-3dhd-wireless-home-theater-networking-kit-preview?start=1 ''Netgear WNHDB3004 3DHD Wireless Home Theater Networking Kit
Preview'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *[https://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/31338-netgear-wnhdb3004-3dhd-wireless-home-theater-networking-kit-review ''Netgear WNHDB3004 3DHD Wireless Home Theater Networking Kit
Review'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] [[Category:English Documentation]]
